transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to request a refill on one of my medications.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Opry Myindos. Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopaedics, part of Pretty Good ai. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, my name is Linda Park. I'm calling to request a refill for my lisinopril prescription.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Linda. You please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your name is Linda Park, and your date of birth is April eighth nineteen sixty two. Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. My first name is spelled L-I-N-D-A and my last name is P-A-R-K.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please provide that number. If you're not sure, just let me know and we can confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. I have your phone number as five five five one two three

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: four five six seven, and your date of birth is April eighth nineteen sixty two.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't pull up your information right now, but I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up with you about your lisinopril refill. Please hold on while I document your request.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, thank you. I appreciate your help.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer is not available right now since this is a demo clinic.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: That's okay, as long as someone can follow up with me about the refill. Thank you for your assistance.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Understood. I've noted your request for a lisinopril refill. And our clinic support team will follow-up with you as soon as possible. Have a good day.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you so much. Have a great day! Goodbye.
